pages.title: Bloodstone
pages.text: The rather effulgent feathers of the $(l:creating_life/kindlings)Kindlings$(/l) are notable, enough so to compel you to regularly give the little bumpkins coat trimmings.$(br)However, you've noticed that, sadly quite frequently, drops of blood will come along with the feathers. Dipped in $(l:magical_blocks/liquid_crystal)Liquid Crystal$(), it leaves behind a sparkly, crystalline residue.

pages.title: Refining Bloodstone
pages.text: Set upon the crystallarieum and given a $(bold)$(italic)$(fuck)precarious$() amount of $(item)Copper$(), the speck of dragonblood will grow and crystallize into a grand slab of glass, shining in stunning scarlet and bleeding with willful magic!
